Editing a Query

To display a useful set of data, you may need to edit or add to a query.

To edit a query:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click a component tab.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Right-click a column header on the upper pane. Then select Queries from the context menu.

    • Select Filters > Queries from the component or context menu.

    The Queries dialog opens.

  4. Select the query to be edited from the list, and then click Edit. The Edit Query [xxx] dialog opens.

  5. Edit the appropriate nodes of the tree.

  6. Click Save. This action re-displays the Query dialog, which lists the edited query.

  7. Click Close.
